content: This article illustrates the absolute necessity of a new, high-speed interstate rail system modeled after the Interstate Highway System where the rails are owned and maintained by the states with federal assistance. It's time to raise the federal tax on gasoline by at least 25 cents to finance this essential infrastructure project. The federal tax has not been raised in 25 years and then by only 4.3 cents!  We can afford it, and cannot afford not to do it if we really want to "Make America Great Again" when it comes to 21st century high-speed rail transportation.
